title: Kimi wa Boku wo Suki ni Naru
sinopse:
The cheerful and open high school freshman, Nakazato Haruka has fallen in love! With his classmate - basketball's club Tajima Kaoru. Haruka started his fierce attacks, and also declared "You will like me for sure!" How will the cool and quiet Kaoru react after knowing about Haruka's feelings?

(Source: Peccatore Sanctuary)
